Name: Peter J Demarko
Scenario: I want to read on industry news and share information with my colleagues, but I hate giving my email to do this. I am looking for something that respects my privacy.

Name: Lee-anne Rutherland
Scenario: I want to watch and learn how to do things related to my industry, but I don’t like leaving one website to download needed files. I am a parent, and when I am with my kids at their appointments, I need to be able to watch these on all sorts of devices.

Name: Lena Wagner-Bauer
Dislikes: Pay walls, distracting UI or features
Scenario: I want to learn more about my industry and pick up new skills so I can earn more money. I don’t want to spend money or give my email to do this. I am newer to the industry, and I am not even sure I’ll stay in it long.

Name: John Aaron Smith
Scenario: I want access to tools that can unlock my time, without having to read long blogs about them. Just give me what I need, and give it fast.

Name: Simran Gupta-Sharma
Scenario: I love infographics, but I am not very artistic. I want to find ways to present data visually without needing to install expensive software. English isn’t my first language, so I struggle with long complicated words. Once I find something my eye likes, I tend to explore. Long walls of text turn me away.

Name: Priya Patel
Scenario: I am not the greatest programmer, but I can figure things out with some documentation. I am looking for tools with better documentation. I am pretty busy and I need reminders for when new content comes out because I have so many alerts. I get so many that I block pop ups and ads with my browser.
